00160     public: virtual inline void setPacketType (PacketType t) {
00161       if (t != PacketType_Context) {
00162         throw VRTException("Can not change packet type to non-Context type when using BasicContextPacket");
00163       }
00164       BasicVRTPacket::setPacketType(t);
00165     }

00185     // XXX - overriding public: virtual bool BasicVRTPacket::isChangePacket () const
00186     //       since that is hard-coded to return true (valid for Data packets), but here we get that
00187     //       value from inline bool IndicatorFieldProvider::isChangePacket() const;
00188     public: virtual bool isChangePacket() const {
00189       return IndicatorFieldProvider::isChangePacket();
00190     }

00205     // FIXME - this is probably incorrect. The spec says timestamp adjustment applies
00206     //         to the timestamp of each associated data packet, and NOT to the timestamp
00207     //         of the context packet. That means this function is impossible to ever
00208     //         return valid without access to a DataPacket and ContextPacket together.
00209     //         See Section 9.7.3.1 of V49.2 draft spec
00210     public: TimeStamp getAdjustedTimeStamp () const {
00211       int64_t adj = getTimeStampAdjustment();
00212       return (adj == INT64_NULL)? getTimeStamp() : getTimeStamp().addPicoSeconds(adj);
00213     }

00316     protected: virtual int32_t getContextIndicatorField0 (bool occurrence=0) const {
00317       UNUSED_VARIABLE(occurrence);
00318       return VRTMath::unpackInt(bbuf, getPrologueLength());
00319     }
00320     protected: virtual int32_t getContextIndicatorField1 (bool occurrence=0) const {
00321       UNUSED_VARIABLE(occurrence);
00322       if (!isCIF1Enable()) return 0;
00323       return VRTMath::unpackInt(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+4);
00324     }
00325     protected: virtual int32_t getContextIndicatorField2 (bool occurrence=0) const {
00326       UNUSED_VARIABLE(occurrence);
00327       if (!isCIF2Enable()) return 0;
00328       int32_t off = 0;
00329       if (isCIF1Enable()) off+=4;
00330       return VRTMath::unpackInt(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+4+off);
00331     }
00332     protected: virtual int32_t getContextIndicatorField3 (bool occurrence=0) const {
00333       UNUSED_VARIABLE(occurrence);
00334       if (!isCIF3Enable()) return 0;
00335       int32_t off = 0;
00336       if (isCIF1Enable()) off+=4;
00337       if (isCIF2Enable()) off+=4;
00338       return VRTMath::unpackInt(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+4+off);
00339     }
00340     protected: virtual int32_t getContextIndicatorField7 (bool occurrence=0) const {
00341       UNUSED_VARIABLE(occurrence);
00342       if (!isCIF7Enable()) return 0;
00343       int32_t off = 0;
00344       if (isCIF1Enable()) off+=4;
00345       if (isCIF2Enable()) off+=4;
00346       if (isCIF3Enable()) off+=4;
00347       return VRTMath::unpackInt(bbuf, getPrologueLength()+4+off);
00348     }

00388     protected: inline Geolocation getGeolocation (int8_t cifNum, int32_t field, int32_t cif7bit) const {
00389       int32_t off = getOffset(cifNum, field, cif7bit);
00390       Geolocation val;
00391       if (off >= 0) unpackPayloadRecord(off,val);
00392       return val;
00393     }

00397       int32_t off = getOffset(cifNum, field, cif7bit);
00398       Ephemeris val;
00399       if (off >= 0) unpackPayloadRecord(off,val);
00400       return val;

00412     public: inline GeoSentences getGeoSentences (IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) const {
00413       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00414       int32_t off = getOffset(0, protected_CIF0::GPS_ASCII_mask, cif7bit);
00415       GeoSentences val;
00416       if (off >= 0) unpackPayloadRecord(off,val);
00417       return val;
00418     }

00509     public: virtual PayloadFormat getDataPayloadFormat (IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) const {
00510       // INT64_NULL (0x8000000000000000) is actually a valid PayloadFormat bit arrangement, so we
00511       // can't use the normal isNull(bits) check. This isn't an issue in Java where null is
00512       // not equal to a legal 64-bit integer value.
00513       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00514       int32_t off = getOffset(0, protected_CIF0::DATA_FORMAT_mask, cif7bit);
00515       return (off < 0)? PayloadFormat() // NULL
00516                       : PayloadFormat(getX(0, protected_CIF0::DATA_FORMAT_mask, cif7bit));
00517     }
00518
